name: Gryth
description:
Gryth was created entirely during PegJam 2013 - an event where creative folk of all stripes get together to make brand new games over the course of a weekend.

Gryth was designed and developed by:

  • Andrew Orr | website | twitter | github
  • Fernando Chorney | website | soundcloud | twitter | github
  • Tish
  • Neena

Here is a video of all the PegJam 2013 demo presentations. Ours starts at 6:45 or so:
